full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR RGYAS BSDUS BYA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR 'DI NI BRGYUD LAS GSUNG BA'I BZLOG BSGYUR HA CANG CHUNG BA LA DE LTAR LHAN THABS SU BRI BA NI, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL, ,BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS RANG DANG SKAL @011B NYAMS RNAMS SU PHAN PAR REB BSAL BA'I SGO NAS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NYES LHAG CHANG 'BYUNG, ,BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYI SPYAN SNGAR BSHAGS TE BZOD PAR ZHUS, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZANG YOD NA BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BYANG CHUB GYI SNYING PO MTHOB KYI BAR DU, ,BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYI 'PHRAL MED GROGS MDZAD NAS GAL RKYEN BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHING MCHOG MTHUN MONG GI DNGOS GRUB STZAL DU GSOL, ,)
